channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1185; 04:21PM; 22250 W Strathern St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IVDUee; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters encountered excessive storage conditions inside the structure which created challenges reaching the seat of the fire. The fire was mostly towards the rear of the home and extended into the attic. Both occupants were out of the home prior to LAFD arrival and have no medical complaints. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E296 E305 E72 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1185; 03:57PM; 22250 W Strathern St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IVDUee; Canoga Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E296 E305 E72 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1053; 03:17PM; 100 N Alvarado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qgHWHE; Westlake; Three car collision with a total of five patients (no entrapment). One patient fled the scene, one patient declined LAFD transport, three patients (two adults, one child) transported in critical condition (further details per patient not available). The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:44PM. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Rampart Division Inc# 2656; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 E3 EM11 RA20 RA209 RA26 RA3 RA811 T20; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Hiker Rescue - FATALITY; INC#0354; 08:59AM; 2698 N Commonwealth Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MJ6YqF; Griffith Park; Update: The hiking trail at Vista Del Valle Dr will be closed to the public while LAPD conducts their (per protocol) investigation (unknown duration but likely several hours). The initial reports of the patient being on a bicycle and revised to reflect he appears to have been on foot - there was no bike by him. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 1140 ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E235 E35 E90 EM11 H3 H7 HA3 HA7 RA35 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - FATALITY; INC#0354; 08:42AM; 2698 N Commonwealth Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MJ6YqF; Griffith Park; Firefighters located an approximately 50 yo male patient who appears to have been riding a bicycle when he went into severe medical distress. Firefighter/Paramedics provided intensive, advanced life-saving care coordinated with the base hospital. Sadly, he was beyond medical help and was pronounced dead on scene. LAPD Inc #1140 is responding for the investigation (per protocol). "Base Hospital" = one of a limited number of hospitals which is responsible for directing the advanced life support system or limited advanced life support system and prehospital care system assigned to it by the local EMS agency. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:02AM. No further details; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E235 E35 H3 H7 HA3 HA7 RA35 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0430; 09:38AM; 1541 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OLsrSe; #Westlake; It took 52 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish a vacant two-story duplex on fire (site of a previous burn). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E203 E209 E210 E26 E9 EM11 EM14 RA10 RA11 RA209 RA811 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0430; 08:58AM; 1541 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OLsrSe; #Westlake; Two-story duplex (vacant) with fire on the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E203 E209 E210 E26 E9 EM11 RA11 RA209 RA811 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Rubbish Fire; INC#0342; 08:02AM; 6099 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3INR8cY; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters responded to a rubbish fire which spread to four tiny homes, causing damage. Firefighters quickly extinguished the flames. No reported injures. Cause under investigation. Nothing further. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; E289 E89 RA889 RA89 T89; CH8; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0185; 04:53AM; 800 S Cecilia St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C5ZuJa; #DowntownLA; It took 55 firefighters 33 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames of an outside rubbish fire, which spread to part of a two-story commercial building. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 RA10 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0185; 04:20AM; 800 S Cecilia St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C5ZuJa; #DowntownLA; Outside fire extending inside a two-story commercial building. Offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 RA10 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
